Title: Microsoft Surface Pro X Diagnostic Service
Body (HTML):
Microsoft Surface Pro X Diagnostic Service

 

At iFixYouri, we understand. Your Microsoft Surface Pro X is really important to you. When it breaks, it can really mess up your day. If you are in need of Diagnostic Service, let the professional repair technicians at iFixYouri help you out.

 

*NOTE: If you decline repairs for diagnostic or water damage treatment or your device is deemed non-repairable, you will be responsible for shipping and handling.

This is the service you need if you aren't quite sure what the problem with your Microsoft Surface Pro X is. We'll find out what is going on, and contact you with a repair quote.

 

iFixYouri is here to solve your problem with Diagnostic Service for Microsoft Surface Pro X. With this service, we'll determine the extent of the damage, get your device repaired, and send it back to you. We'll let you know if there are any other issues affecting your device and give you the option of proceeding with those repairs.

 

Free UPS ground shipping and $100 of insurance are included. You may purchase faster shipping options and additional insurance protection using the drop-down options above. That's up to you. Don't send us your cables, charges, or cases please. We have plenty here already :) Just package your Microsoft Surface Pro X in a secure box and affix the provided label.

 

Questions about Diagnostic Service? Type them into the box below, and we'll get back to you as soon as possible. Alternatively, you can reach us at 888-494-4349 or support@ifixyouri.com
SEO Title: Microsoft Surface Pro X Diagnostic Service
SEO Description: Microsoft Surface Pro X Diagnostic Service performed by repair experts iFixYouri. Warranty included. Call today 888-494-4349.

Title: Microsoft Surface Pro X Glass Repair
Body (HTML):
Microsoft Surface Pro X Glass Repair

 

At iFixYouri, we understand. Your Microsoft Surface Pro X is really important to you. When it breaks, it can really mess up your day. If you are in need of Glass Repair, let the professional repair technicians at iFixYouri help you out.

Those who have both cracked glass and a broken LCD should opt for our Microsoft Surface Pro X Glass & LCD Repair. This service is for glass breakage only.

 

After checkout, you'll receive an email confirmation and shipping label. When your phone arrives at our repair center, we do diagnostic tests to determine if any other issues are at play. Outgoing testing ensures that your Microsoft Surface Pro X is fully functional. With the repairs complete, we send you a tracking number and ship your Microsoft Surface Pro X back to you!

 

Free UPS ground shipping and $100 of insurance are included. You may purchase faster shipping options and additional insurance protection using the drop-down options above. That's up to you. Don't send us your cables, charges, or cases please. We have plenty here already :) Just package your Microsoft Surface Pro X in a secure box and affix the provided label.

 

All replacement parts come with a 90-day warranty that covers all but accidental damage.
